Title: Relates to requiring certain disclosures by attorneys performing services in connection with a real property tax grievance procedure
Summary: Requires any contract or retainer agreement between a property owner and an attorney for legal services related to the filing and appearance before a board of assessment review regarding complaints in relation to assessments shall include a written disclosure that such complaints in relation to assessments can be completed without the assistance of an attorney; limits fees charged for representation before a board of assessment review.
